frameDefinitions: This frame describes the Impression which a Figure, which can be a person, an organization, or an object, leaves with an Audience.
An Entity persists in a stable situation called a State
This frame contains general locale words, and is mostly a place-holder in the hierarchy.
This frame concerns transparent nouns that denote Instances of Types of entities or events.
An Experiencer, Expressor, or State can be described as having a surprised emotion as evoked by a Stimulus or concerning a Topic.
This frame concerns an Evaluee being judged for its quality, i.e. how much it would probably be liked.
frameExamples: He had an extremely fragile self - <t><fex name='Impression'>image</fex></t>

The survey confirmed that management interference in team operations had increased , and <t><fex name='Instance'>instances</fex></t> of management decisions being taken without team consultation had also increased .
I was more <t>shocked</t> about the child than she was.
listRoleDefinitions: The entity (a person, organization, product, or event) for which the <fen>Audience</fen> has an <fen>Impression</fen>.
A person or group of people who have an <fen>Impression</fen> of a <fen>Figure</fen>.
A generalized conception of a <fen>Figure</fen> presented to or shared by an <fen>Audience</fen>.
A stable bounded area.  It is typically the designation of the nouns of Locale-derived frames.
A thing or episode of a certain <fen>Type</fen>.
The category of thing or event of which an <fen>Instance</fen> is picked out.
The <fen>Experiencer</fen> is the person or sentient entity that experiences or feels the emotions.
The <fen>Topic</fen> is the general area in which the emotion occurs.  It indicates a range of possible <fen>Stimulus</fen>.
The <fen>Stimulus</fen> is the person, event, or state of affairs that evokes the emotional response in the <fen>Experiencer</fen>.

The body part, gesture, or other expression of the <fen>Experiencer</fen> that reflects his or her emotional state.  They describe a presentation of the experience or emotion denoted by the adjective or noun.
The <fen>State</fen> is the abstract noun that describes a more lasting experience by the <fen>Experiencer</fen>.
The <fen>Time</fen> when the <fen>Experiencer</fen>, <fen>Expressor</fen>, or <fen>State</fen> can be described as having said emotion.
The <fen>Evaluee</fen> is being judged for its quality.
This role marks expressions that denote a scalar property of the <fen>Evaluee</fen> with respect to which the <fen>Evaluee</fen> is judged.
listRoleExamples: There used to be a forest in that area.
I collected two <t>specimens</t> <fex>of this rare species</fex>.
The Beaujolais Nouveau is dazzling <fex>in freshness</fex>.

sourceCandidateSpans.text: Chapter 5, Implementing the MVVM Pattern and Chapter 6
